title: Article 1 - General Provisions
content:
Article 1 - General Provisions

State Regulations

Part 700 - General (§ 700.1 to 700.8)

Part 701 - Repealed

Part 702 - Environmental Health (§ 702.1 to 702.7)

Part 703 - Ambulatory Services (§ 703.1 to 703.6)

Part 704 - Repealed

Part 705 - New Medical Technology And Health Services Demonstration Projects (§ 705.1 to 705.11)

Part 706 - Repealed (§ 706.1 to 706.2)

Part 707 - Physician's Assistants And Specialist's Assistants (§ 707.1 to 707.3)

Part 708 - Appropriateness Review (§ 708.1 to 708.6)

Part 709 - Determination Of Public Need For Medical Facility Construction (§ 709.1 to 709.17)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
